Subject: ARM Processor Client Support
Description:
We are currently on server version 5.9.4.1, and the most updated Windows Client we can download is 6.2.4.1, but only the x32 and x64 versions.

Are these clients fully functional and supported on Windows 10 and 11 systems running on ARM procssors?

We don't have any currently so I can't test, but we have groups asking to purchase them and I want to make sure our security software is supported on them before giving the okay.
What_We_Know__c:
Informed customer that we have plans to implement this compatibility in the EPP clients in the future. This is currently spiked and will be available in a future release, but not in 5.9.4.3.
---
Checked with Eduard, not supported.
Next_Steps__c:
Waiting on customer.
---
Asked if there are any future plans to support ARM processors in Eng Chat.
Solution_Comment__c: Informed customer that we have plans to implement this compatibility in the EPP clients in the future. This is currently spiked and will be available in a future release, but not in 5.9.4.3.
